alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee; Tulsa; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 12:27AM CDT until August 14 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southwestern Washington County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1227 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Wynona to 2 miles southeast of Hominy to 3 miles south of Osage, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Owasso... Skiatook... Collinsville... Hominy... Cleveland... Barnsdall... Sperry... Ramona... Wynona... Ochelata... Avant... Vera... Osage... Walnut Creek State Park... Turley... Tallant... Pershing... Wolco... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
